topic.title: Please Save The Children... Please...
topic.body:
And, so what happened to me was not exactly covered by the Q-Anon Conspiracy Theory, but it is very closely entangled or so it would seem... 

Again, all of what I am telling you was provided to my local police and then passed on to the FBI for further investigation in the year 2017 just BEFORE Q-Anon came to be... So, please feel free to do a Freedom Of Information Act Request for more detailed information... Thank you...

Very peculiar timing to say the least...

As a child of only 11 years old, I was provided strong doses of 2,5-dimethoxy-4-ethylphenethylamine (aka 2ce or tucy) by an individual who went by the pseudonyms OtakuBoi666 and MyExcuse whose real name was/is supposedly Cameron Peter Rezk.

He pointed out how funny it was that his initials spelled CPR once... Side note... Sorry... Flashback..

Anyway, he asked me to watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nr8jqQcR8TA

Eventually introducing me to several "other" individuals who were involved in his scheme which operated out of San Fransisco Bay Area... Once I informed my local police he "disappeared" according to those of his associates who still had contact with him far long after I had broken off my relationship with him... The things he taught me were unspeakable... For some idea of what he had been doing, please see the following article found here: https://www.bibliotecapleyades.net/sociopolitica/mindcontrol/chapter03.htm

He was a Hitler Fanatic and even sent many photos of him in Nazi Uniform... 

Please Please Please! Save Our Children!

This is not a matter of QAnon being a PsyOp or not...

I was HIT BY A TRUCK AND HOSPITALIZED IN 2011 AS I BEGAN EXPOSING THIS!!!

This is a cry for HELP!!!

https://www.bibliotecapleyades.net/sociopolitica/esp_sociopol_mindcon52.htm

#MakeAmericaFreeAgain
#SaveOurChildren
#MKUltra

topic.title: We are making progress everyone!
topic.body:
Thanks to the hundreds and thousands who have been showing their support for the movement online, and also the tens of thousands that have decided to show up in the streets now that communication channels such as Twitter and Facebook have been censoring such activists, the authorities have finally begun to respond to our requests to end child trafficking!!

Just check these news articles out, and please watch the videos showing a protest in California that was among the first in the country. The fight is not over and many more protests are being planned across the United States at this time in order to further bring awareness to the cause.

We cannot do this alone, so thank you for your support everyone!

https://heavy.com/news/2020/08/save-the-children-100-city-march/

https://www.pennlive.com/news/2020/08/save-our-children-protest-in-harrisburg-calls-for-action-against-child-predators.html

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-8671927/US-Marshalls-39-missing-children-Georgia-two-week-operation-arrest-nine-people.html

https://www.wpbf.com/article/man-arrested-in-port-st-lucie-connected-to-large-sex-trafficking-bust-operation/33827647

https://www.wkyc.com/article/news/local/northeast-ohio/us-marshals-locate-25-missing-northeast-ohio-children/95-7c7e61f8-0764-4099-840a-ca85e8c463e3

https://www.bitchute.com/video/n8GtQTDlyBZQ/

1598242145_1M8tVWMfjhezUzmRxrzyBaSiZc3Qb.body:
Please just save the children...

Please... :'(

1597510687_12QcU9x7iK1XjguRKQKKhyc6Erguz.body:
Please Please Please hear me out!!

Again, feel free to do a Freedom Of Information Act Request to prove I am telling you the truth!!! 

Please! I don't want anyone else to get hurt by this; especially not the children!!

What was done to me is horrific and I can barely even talk about it... :'(
